Method.name: CopyValueFromEngToAnother
Method.Implementation:
set st = $$$OK
try{ TSTART
&sql(DECLARE CCur CURSOR FOR SELECT %NOLOCK ID FROM Dance_Data.AgeCategory)
&sql(OPEN CCur) for{ &sql(FETCH CCur INTO :id) quit:(SQLCODE '= 0)
set obj = ##class(Dance.Data.AgeCategory).%OpenId(id) $$$THROWONERROR(st, obj.Name.SetValueByLang(obj.Name.GetValueByLang("en"), newLang)) }
&sql(CLOSE CCur)
TCOMMIT } catch ex { TROLLBACK
set st = ex.AsStatus() }
quit st
